heading: Let's Connect – I'm Shlomi, a Full-Stack Developer with a Passion for Technology
description: I specialize in developing cutting-edge web applications with a strong focus on performance, scalability, and seamless user experience. With deep expertise in modern technologies, I craft intelligent solutions tailored precisely to your needs.
call_to_action: Let’s build something exceptional together. Get in touch, and let’s discuss your next project!

sidebar.name: Shlomi
sidebar.description: I specialize in designing and developing robust systems using JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, React, and Next.js. With extensive experience and a creative mindset, I build innovative solutions that drive results.

contact.title: Let’s Connect and Create Something Meaningful
contact.description: If you're looking for an experienced developer to bring your vision to life with creative and innovative solutions, I'm here. Let's discuss how we can work together to make it happen!

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Take a look at some of the projects I’ve built—smart applications, advanced systems, and outstanding user experiences. Each project showcases my expertise, precision, and creativity in problem-solving and development.

opengraph.title: Shlomi | Full-Stack Developer
opengraph.description: A full-stack developer with extensive experience in building high-performance, scalable web applications. Explore my portfolio!
